## Type of Change
<!-- Mark with an 'x' all that apply -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security fix
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Refactoring

## Security Checklist
<!-- IMPORTANT: Complete this section for any code changes -->

- [ ] I have reviewed `PRODUCTION_AUDIT.md` for security requirements
- [ ] This change does not introduce new security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Input validation has been added/updated where necessary
- [ ] Path sanitization is used for all file operations
- [ ] No sensitive data is logged or exposed
- [ ] Authentication checks are in place (if applicable)
- [ ] Rate limiting is considered (if applicable)

## Testing
<!-- Describe the tests you ran -->

- [ ] I have tested this locally
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios
